go-between.translation[0].definitions[0]: someone who takes messages from one person or group to another because the two sides cannot meet or do not want to meet
A UN representative will act as a go-between for leaders of the two countries.
go-between.translation[1].definitions[0]: a person or company that acts for another person or company as their representative or AGENT
We act as a go-between for supplier and buyers and help them develop trading links.
